name: Yep, it's Another 2D Platformer!
description:
Do you like 2D platformers? Then this game got you covered, wait what do you mean there are 500 new 2D platformers coming out everyday? 

Oh well, this is just a normal 2D platformer that I've used as a learning experience with GameMaker 2 and game development in general. its short, challenging but fair and has some fun mechanics! It features 10 levels including a difficult version of each stage in a gamemode called The Hell Gauntlet! If you include the hub world and tutorial, that is 22 levels in total!

The game also features some sick tunes by Joakim "Klagarn" Jansson! You can check out the entire soundtrack here!
